## isString() function

Determines whether the input is string or not.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isString(value: unknown): value is string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | unknown | input |

<b>Returns:</b>

value is string

true if the input is string, false otherwise.

## Example


```ts
isString("string") // true
isString('string') // true
isString(`string`) // true
isString(123)      // false
```
